-e ---

# Semantic sense

𒉆 NAM- SIM- -ism !

abstract suffix
𓏛 -us-ma -ism -sum -sym -most -mes -ness

𓂋 𓈖 osmun (sumero/numero reim/name/remember/reden)

Latin superlative in
-issimus is matched by a Celtic formation in
-isamo-, both going back to a protoform *-ism̥ho

𒅖𒈠𒀀 iš-ma-a "hearing" 𓋴 𓅓 𓄔

𓋴 𓅓 𓄔 semaⁿ hear/sense ism IŠ-MU 𒅖𒈬 <> 𒅖 kuš₇ > •haiš 𐌷𐌰𐌿𐍃 hörs "hear"

𓂝 𓈙 𓅓 𓅆 | image (of god) | ism
